author: Subhash Popuri (@pbssubhash), Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Thurein Oo, Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems), Dylan Shield (Shieldia.co)
false_positives: Expected to be continuously seen on systems exposed to the Internet
name: SIGMA - Path Traversal Exploitation Attempts Med Sec
query:
from logs-apache.access-default metadata _id, _index, _version | where url.query rlike ".*etc/+passwd.*" or url.query rlike ".*etc[%2f]+passwd.*" or url.query rlike ".*var/+log.*" or url.query rlike ".*var[%2f]+log.*" or url.query rlike ".*var/+lib.*" or url.query rlike ".*var[%2f]+lib.*" or url.query rlike ".*var/+www.*" or url.query rlike ".*var[%2f]+www.*"
| eval timebucket=date_trunc(5minutes, @timestamp) | stats value_count=count_distinct(url.query) by timebucket, source.ip, host.name
| where value_count >= 1
